verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MNR: mistakenly] [V: said] [ARG1: he approved a military pay raise for the " first time in 10 years] . " He meant to say it was the largest pay raise , the White House says . It is the largest in eight years . But pay increases are determined by a statutory formula .

President Donald Trump mistakenly said [ARG0: he] [V: approved] [ARG1: a military pay raise] [ARGM-TMP: for the " first time in 10 years] . " He meant to say it was the largest pay raise , the White House says . It is the largest in eight years . But pay increases are determined by a statutory formula .
